QueryDefinition.Query:
with dc as ( SELECT ENROLID AS PERSON_ID, SVCDATE AS DRUG_EXPOSURE_START_DATE, NULL AS STOP_REASON, REFILL AS REFILLS, ROUND(METQTY,0) AS QUANTITY, CASE WHEN DAYSUPP > 365 THEN 365 WHEN DAYSUPP < 0 THEN 1 WHEN DAYSUPP IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE DAYSUPP END AS DAYS_SUPPLY, NULL AS SIG, NULL AS PRESCRIBING_PROVIDER_ID, NULL AS VISIT_OCCURRENCE_ID, NULL AS RELEVANT_CONDITION_CONCEPT_ID, NDCNUM AS DRUG_SOURCE_VALUE, SUBSTRING(NDCNUM,1,9) DRUG_SOURCE_VALUE_9, {field}, {field2}, 44818668 CurrencyConceptId, pay TOTAL_PAID, {vendor}, ch.PartitionId FROM {sc}.DRUG_CLAIMS JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND ENROLID = ch.PERSON_ID )
SELECT PERSON_ID, DRUG_EXPOSURE_START_DATE, CASE WHEN RXMR = '2' THEN '32857' ELSE '32869' END AS TYPE_CONCEPT_ID, CASE WHEN RXMR != '2' THEN '1' ELSE '0' END AS VISIT, STOP_REASON, REFILLS, QUANTITY, DAYS_SUPPLY, SIG, PRESCRIBING_PROVIDER_ID, VISIT_OCCURRENCE_ID, RELEVANT_CONDITION_CONCEPT_ID, DRUG_SOURCE_VALUE, DRUG_SOURCE_VALUE_9, hlthplan, CurrencyConceptId, TOTAL_PAID, vendor, PartitionId FROM dc ORDER BY PartitionId, PERSON_ID
